original_text: And the leaders said to them, “Let them live.” So they became cutters of wood and drawers of water for all the congregation, just as the leaders had said of them.
korean_text: 무리에게 이르되 그들을 살리라 하니 족장들이 그들에게 이른 대로 그들이 온 회중을 위하여 나무를 패며 물을 긷는 자가 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And the leaders said to them
So they became cutters of wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 나무를 자르는 자가 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: just as the leaders had said of them
